result.repo_summary_line: The repository is a wallet manager application that integrates announcements, user preferences, DApp management, and tracking features.

monorepo_services.name: app
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Sets up and runs the main application, including an HTTP server and a metrics server.

monorepo_services.name: clean_cronjob
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Implements a cron job that cleans old announcements from a database.

monorepo_services.name: clean_highlight_dapps
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Cleans expired highlights from a database and logs the process.

monorepo_services.name: clean_old_special_offers
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Cleans old special offers from a PostgreSQL database.

monorepo_services.name: ip_location
monorepo_services.short_purpose: Initializes a Sentry client for error tracking and downloads a new IP location database.
